dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Levin (for himself and Mrs. Kiggans of Virginia) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 37, United States Code, to lower the threshold required for the Secretary of Defense to make a temporary adjustment to a rate of the basic allowance for housing for members of the uniformed services, and to make permanent the authority to make such adjustment.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Service Member Housing Relief Act.

section.header: Temporary adjustment to a rate of the basic allowance for housing for members of the uniformed services: lower threshold; permanent authority
